name: Find your door
description:
You are in a maze and you are trying to escape from a red cube (Laughs) Your goal is to find a brown door. But be careful You are not alone. (Oops, I spoiled it...)

How to play:

W,A,S,D to move

Shift to run

Space to jump

Goal:

Avoid the red totally scary cube. :)

Find your (Brown) Door
